___Type.description: It is a pattern manager module

$eref.description: A schema, all context processor modules should sattisfy to
$eref.title: Schema for all Context Processor Modules

___OutputParams.description: Params that specify how lattice should be printed into the file and what should be computed for a concept
___OutputParams.title: Lattice Output Params

___OutStabEstimation.description: Should output estimation of concept stability? Much faster then concept stability.
___OutStabEstimation.title: Output Estimation of Concept Stability

___OutOrder.description: Should output order of concepts in the lattice?
___OutOrder.title: Output Concept Order

___MinLift.description: If lift of a concept, i.e., the minimal differnce in objects between the concept extent and extents of its children, is smaller then a given value, the concept is not outputted as a selected concept
___MinLift.title: Minimal lift of a concept

___OutExtent.description: Should output extent of a concept?
___OutExtent.title: Output Extent

___MinExtentSize.description: If cardinality of a concept extent is smaller then a given value, the concept is not outputted as a selected concept
___MinExtentSize.title: Minimal cardinality of a concept extent

___MinStab.description: If stability of a concept (see Sergei O. Kuznetsov 1990, 2007) is smaller than a given value, the concept is not outputted as a selected concept. Depending on 'IsStabilityInLog' it can be given either in (0,1), if not in log, or in (0,+inf).
___MinStab.title: Minimal stability of a concept

___OutSupport.description: Should output support of a concept (cardinality of concept extent)?
___OutSupport.title: Output Support

___IsStabilityInLog.description: Should stability be computed and outputed in a logarithmic scale? Logarithmic scale has a better precision but the results are in (0,+inf).
___IsStabilityInLog.title: Stability in Loragithmic Scale

___Type.description: It is a pattern manager module

$eref.description: A schema, all pattern managers modules should sattisfy to
$eref.title: Schema for all Pattern Manager Modules

___PatternManager.description: Pattern manager used to process (intersection, checking subsumption) patterns and objects in the context
___PatternManager.title: Pattern Manager for Descriptions

description: A context processor implementing AddIntent algorithm for formal lattice construction
title: AddIntent Context Processor
